column4: how do i create a shortcut to a folder /media/sda1 and /media/sda5 on desktop?
go to /media/  rightclick,  make the short cut and move it to where youwant
'make link' in the menu is greyed out
you might need to be root for that folder , you can also try   terminal     sudo ln-s  /media/sda1  /home/user/Desktop/sda1
but drives mounted in /media/ are suppose to appear on your desktop automaticaly
im using the ntfs configuration tool
that sudo  ln -s command should do it
the jdk pacakges are in the repos you donT need the tar.gz files
well then where is the jdk installed? coz i need to set JAVA_HOME
devede, it is in the repos but I suggest you get the latest from the site, there is a new menu feature in it which is quite nice
do it from synaptic,  there might be several other packages that need removal
